遥远的记得小学的时候因为球队的人而认识CS,进一步认识HL,进一步认识了V社.然后开始玩各种V社的游戏(进入了大坑).2006初二那年,在playhl论坛(现在这个论坛也没剩几个人了)众人的推崇下,我开始玩了这款游戏.
你懂的在最中二的年纪,在班里成立了xx党的我们,在我的安利之下很多同学都跑来玩了这个游戏.虽说当时大家都是盗版口袋里也没什么钱,steam也没有那么发达...可是大家都玩得不亦乐乎.
特别是周末的晚上,研究所的服务器,量子的小图服务器,基本上最少有5个我们班里的人在玩着...每天都在研究哪里机枪狙击阴人,哪里可以包抄用铲子爆菊,哪里好飞枪榴弹,并且十分热衷于用近战武器偷菊花之前截图炫耀而多次因此被反杀....
07年大改版之后,我们也即将迈入了高中,也少了很多游戏的时间.盗版也从那时候开始不再支持联机(虽说现在好像又行了).游戏和朋友们也越走越远的样子.之后dods就再也没有更新的动静了..
虽说这次9块的打折,算是最便宜的还债.但是在多年之后又一次玩了这个充满回忆的游戏,真是百感交集...真希望V社没有完全放弃这款游戏,希望有一点点机会让他再次火起来的一天..

Bad, i mean REALLY bad.
The only reason i got this is that it was just 1.70 euros on sale, so why not actually ?
The gameplay and the mechanics are copy and pasted from TF2, servers either are full or are totally empty. Don't trust to the reviews below mine, you'll have to TRY to find playable servers (and by playable i mean that there isn't an extremely masculine voice that every 2 second shouts "first blood headshot monster kill score whore" and that there are 10+ players still not filling entirely the server).
In-game you either get killed by rats that spend their time finding a hole into the map to get some "ez killz" or you get godsprayed by a rushing Thompson.
Bots are even worse here, and by worse i mean THERE AREN'T ANY. Like really ? I know that every single game that Volvo did lately is multiplayer based but on a game that runs on the engine that ran the most innovative game ever i'd expect AT LEAST a pratice section where i could pawn some bots, but nevermind.
Movement is so classic and regular that it's barely necessary to mention it. Guns and gunplay in general feels clunky as sin, you will often get oneshotted by like the least damaging gun in the world, just an example and aiming down the rifles' sights is so unnatural and mechanical, and i could keep on for hours staight.
Let's talk about updates : each update that Volvo releases fixes things that no one cares about or even breaks the existing strenghts of the game... Yes, that's confirmed, Volvo puts a lot of effort on their most succesful and well-known titles (and with success i have to admit), but from what i experienced they give shit about less played titles, even the ones that had pretty good predecessor (just like the first DoD which is probably better than Source).

To conclude this review, i can say that this franchise had an unexpected and most importantly undeserved finish, and unless you are willing to pay money for even the lowest tier titles, for God's sake, don't buy this unless you find this on sale but take a look at the first DoD, which in my and most of people's opinion is far better, balanced and fun than THIS.


-13492490890325/10 IGN Volvo pls fix asap

Day of Defeat: Source

     Jedna z jak obsahově, tak graficky průměrných source her, je druhoválečná střílečka DoD: Source. Není sice nijak v výjimečná, přesto je u určité skupiny fanoušků velmi oblíbená. Čím to je ? Zejména velkým množstvím addonů a map, tvořených samotnými hráči a také svou použitelností jako klasická party hra.  Hra dokáže zabavit na dlouhou dobu bez toho aby se omrzela.
     Hra se sice nesnaží o simulaci druhoválečného prostředí, přesto v ní můžeme vidět do jisté míry realistické uniformy a zbraně armády Spojených států a německého Wermachtu, jež jsou jediné hratelné frakce hry. V bitvě pak máte na vybranou mezi loadouty se svými specifickými zbraněmi, například: Střelec (Rifleman), Kulometčík (Machinegunner), Ostrostřelec (Sniper) a další.

Hodnocení: 
85/100

Desculpem o palavrão, mas, puta que pariu! Sou muito fã do DoD. Jogo do carálho. Desculpe de novo. Jogo ele há vários anos e ainda tem muitos serves cheios e com mapas muito massa! Pra quem curte dar uns tiros com tema 2ª guerra mundial, recomendo. Jogo das antigas, sem firula, no basicão, gráficos ótimos e que, depois de anos de lançamento, continua sendo atualizado frequentemente, inclusive com inclusão de novos mapas.
как TF2 только реалистичнее.

This is game is worth some time. If you get it in a bundle or on sale, and are a fan of the WWII combat genre, you'll be pretty satisfied with this game. It may take some getting used to, but I imagine it to be a hidden gem of the Valve collection. Smooth and simple graphics, functional gameplay, and a lot of satisfying kill feedback. 

The HD remake of the orginal Day of Defeat. There doesn't appear to be anymore Valve servers, but the ones that are active are usually very active and are worth adding to your list of favorites, if you can put up with some server sounds and a barrage of the Quake female moans.

Eu jogo DoD desde 2004 e ainda tenho um lugarzinho especial pra ele no meu coração.

Eu gosto deste jogo porque ele é muito balanceado e o único jeito de você se dar bem é jogando bem. Não existe classe overpower, não existe cash. É entrar, escolher uma classe e jogar por horas. As vezes tu passa nervoso com algum camper ou algum Arrombadx de bazuca, mas mesmo assim o jogo ainda vale a pena.
Still fun and easy to play 5 years later. Variety of servers, variety of maps and modes, never really gets old. Will definitely remain a favorite of mine in the FPS department.
A classic fps that still gets my juices flowin'!

At the time of it's release, the gaming world was oversaturated from too many WWII shooters (Call of Duty, Medal of Honor, etc etc) and Day of Defeat didn't have much to separate it from the pile of historical shooters already out there at the time. 

But it's not just that. The game truly is missing something. There's a magic to Valve's multiplayer games. Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, Left 4 Dead, even Half-Life Deathmatch are all massively addictive, appealing games that satisfy as only the best games out there can do. But Day of Defeat: Source doesn't stand out like those games.

Ultimately it comes across feeling like a watered-down version of Battlefield. There's objectives and classes, but the maps are small and there are no vehicles to drive.

So, if you're going to buy a multiplayer shooter, I highly recommend you buy something else. There's nothing actually wrong with Day of Defeat: Source, but for 10 dollars or less you could do way better.

Если хотите постоянных перестрелок в атмосфере Второй мировой войны - это игра для вас. Небольшие размеры карт делают эту игру максимально динамической. Тут вам скучно не станет. Разные классы, предназначение, море карт и стратегий. Сколько не играл, я практически не видео неадекватов. Большинство пользователей этой игры - уже взрослые люди. По этому вы не будете испытывать дискомфорт. Если вы любите тематику Второй мировой войны то игра как раз для вас. Так же для этой игры существует множество модов, моделей игроков и оружия. Единственное что не нравится в этой игре это то, что нельзя пользоваться техников, ни танками, ни зенитками, ни даже обычными джипами. Звуковое оформление на высоте. Если играть в наушниках то можно получить дополнительное удовольствие от звук коновал и выстрелов где-то.
Рекомендую.
